title: Print, "March Winds and April Showers", April 2, 1859
medium: Wood engraving printed in black ink on paper
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Cora E. Wilson
description: Two horizontal pictures on upright page:  Upper shows a sidewalk with pedestrians whose clothes are being blown by wind, and the lower shows another sidewalk, with buildings, traffic in the street, and promenaders walking in rain.  Four columns of verse divide the two pictures.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "March Winds and April Showers", April 2, 1859.
April 2, 1859. Wood engraving printed in black ink on paper. Gift of Cora Wilson. 1939-70-6.
